scripts.postinstall: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const path = require('path'); const rollupPath = path.join(process.cwd(), 'node_modules', 'rollup', 'dist', 'native.js'); if (fs.existsSync(rollupPath)) { try { require(rollupPath); } catch(e) { if (e.message.includes('@rollup/rollup-linux-x64-gnu')) { console.log('Installing Rollup platform-specific binary...'); require('child_process').execSync('npm install @rollup/rollup-linux-x64-gnu --save-optional', {stdio: 'inherit'}); } } }"
